column4: Hey guys I'm having a problem with my screen resolution it's set to 60hz and i cant change it
u need to make sure you know FOR absolutely certain that your monitor can support it and add modelines to xorg
i am absolutely sure
it is supported up to about 85hz but i usually run it at 75hz fine
(in windows anyway)
u could use a livecd like Kanotix and copy the XFree86Config-4
to your harddrive and then copy the modelines from there
I plan on doing that when I have some time
oh ok - wouldnt it be easier to somehow edit it?
I need to to gte mine upto 100, 21 inch is too big for 85
well my way might be faster :)
